idea: Remedi is a one stop cancer management platform aimed to improve the quality of life and treatment outcomes of cancer patients. Remedi helps cancer patients record their treatment and side-effects, assess the quality of care, discover secondary healthcare providers and relevant information providing cancer patients a complete e-care manager at one place.
name: XCLR8 TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Clinic Didi is a platform that supports primary care delivery at the last-mile. It is a nurse-led technology-based intervention to improve primary care. We provide the ANMs with new technology, targeted training, and operating systems to manage a primary care clinic, all tailored to her specific skill set which is different from a doctor. In addition, we involve local community to support outreach and engagement on wellness and health-based awareness.
name: Clinic Didi
